name: Alive In Shelter +18 DLC
description:
Alive In Shelter adult extension which adds drugs, nudity, violence, etc.
Try to survive in underground shelter. Don't kill your family!

It's in alpha version, send me ideas for more ideas :P

You have to be logged to Google Play games to play. After login please restart the application. After clicking "play" be patient launching AIS can take up to 6 seconds :)

It is not Premium DLC, it doesn't remove ads and give premium features, gives only +18/adult features.

Privacy policy: http://188.252.42.80/privacy_policy.html
